DOCNAME: CASE OF GYULANE SZABO v. HUNGARY
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought an action against several private individuals before ORG , seeking the review of a resolution adopted by the community of flatowners of the house in which she lives .
CARDINAL . Following several hearings and an interruption of DATE due to the death of CARDINAL of the respondents , ORG delivered a judgment on DATE .
CARDINAL . NORP On appeal , ORG adopted a partial judgment concerning the substitution of a legal statement , while remitting some claims on DATE .

CARDINAL . In the resumed proceedings the first instance court discontinued the proceedings on DATE . However , the review bench of ORG quashed this decision and instructed the first instance court to resume the proceedings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG gave judgment which was appealed by the applicant . The proceedings are now pending before ORG .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant brought an action against several private individuals before ORG , requesting the court to establish the invalidity of yet another resolution of the flatowners .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG gave judgment , finding partly for the applicant . On appeal , on DATE ORG gave judgment . On DATE ORG dismissed the applicant 's petition for review .
